001package io.ebean;
002
003/**
004 * Deprecated - please migrate to <code>io.ebean.Database</code>.
005 * Provides the API for fetching and saving beans to a particular Database.
006 * <p>
007 * Effectively this is an alias for {@link Database} which is now the new
008 * and improved name for EbeanServer.
009 * <p>
010 * The preference is to use DB and Database rather than Ebean and EbeanServer.
011 */
012@Deprecated
013public interface EbeanServer extends Database {
014
015}
